  • メソッド
com.eje_c.playerservice

インタフェース Player


  • public interface Player
    Abstract interface for internal MediaPlayer or ExoPlayer.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      long getCurrentPosition()
      Gets the current playback position.
      long getDuration()
      Gets the duration of the file.
      int getVideoHeight()
      Returns the height of the video.
      int getVideoWidth()
      Returns the width of the video.
      boolean isPlaying()
      Checks whether the MediaPlayer is playing.
      void onEnd(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Register a callback to be invoked when the end of a media source has been reached during playback.
      void pause()
      Pauses playback.
      void prepareFor(android.net.Uri uri)
      Sets the data source as a content Uri.
      void release()
      Releases resources associated with this Player object.
      void seekTo(long msec)
      Seeks to specified time position.
      void setBufferingListener(BufferingListener bufferingListener)
      Register a callback to be invoked when the status of a network stream's buffer has changed.
      void setOnExceptionListener(OnExceptionListener listener)
      Register a callback to be invoked when an error has happened during an asynchronous operation.
      void setOnRenderStartListener(OnRenderStartListener listener) 
      void setSurface(android.view.Surface surface)
      Sets the Surface to be used as the sink for the video portion of the media.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the volume on this player.
      void start()
      Starts or resumes playback.
      void stop()
      Stops playback after playback has been stopped or paused.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • start

        void start()
        Starts or resumes playback. If playback had previously been paused, playback will continue from where it was paused. If playback had been stopped, or never started before, playback will start at the beginning.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses playback. Call start() to resume.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops playback after playback has been stopped or paused.

      • release

        void release()
        Releases resources associated with this Player object.

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume on this player.
        パラメータ:
        volume - Volume

      • prepareFor

        void prepareFor(android.net.Uri uri)
        Sets the data source as a content Uri.
        パラメータ:
        uri - the Content URI of the data you want to play

      • setSurface

        void setSurface(android.view.Surface surface)
        Sets the Surface to be used as the sink for the video portion of the media.
        パラメータ:
        surface - The Surface to be used for the video portion of the media.

      • onEnd

        void onEnd(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Register a callback to be invoked when the end of a media source has been reached during playback.
        パラメータ:
        runnable - the callback that will be run

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Checks whether the MediaPlayer is playing.
        戻り値:
        true if currently playing, false otherwise

      • getVideoWidth

        int getVideoWidth()
        Returns the width of the video.
        戻り値:
        the width of the video, or 0 if there is no video, no display surface was set, or the width has not been determined yet.

      • getVideoHeight

        int getVideoHeight()
        Returns the height of the video.
        戻り値:
        the height of the video, or 0 if there is no video, no display surface was set, or the height has not been determined yet.

      • seekTo

        void seekTo(long msec)
        Seeks to specified time position.
        パラメータ:
        msec - the offset in milliseconds from the start to seek to

      • getCurrentPosition

        long getCurrentPosition()
        Gets the current playback position.
        戻り値:
        the current position in milliseconds

      • getDuration

        long getDuration()
        Gets the duration of the file.
        戻り値:
        the duration in milliseconds, if no duration is available (for example, if streaming live content), -1 is returned.

      • setBufferingListener

        void setBufferingListener(BufferingListener bufferingListener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when the status of a network stream's buffer has changed.
        パラメータ:
        bufferingListener - the callback that will be run.

      • setOnExceptionListener

        void setOnExceptionListener(OnExceptionListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when an error has happened during an asynchronous operation.
        パラメータ:
        listener - the callback that will be run.

      • setOnRenderStartListener

        void setOnRenderStartListener(OnRenderStartListener listener)
        パラメータ:
        listener - Called when a frame is rendered for the first time since setting the surface, and when a frame is rendered for the first time since a video track was selected.
